Title: Opening a Xiaohongshu Store
Content: Opening a store on Xiaohongshu is a straightforward process that does not require an upfront deposit. Initially, you can skip the deposit requirement unless you need to activate features like shipping insurance, Alipay, WeChat Pay, or withdrawal functions. To register a store, navigate to the Xiaohongshu homepage, click on the three horizontal lines in the top left corner, and select 'Creation Center.' From there, click on 'More Services' and then 'Open Store.' Alternatively, you can go to 'Account and Security,' scroll down to 'Upgrade to Professional Account,' and follow the instructions to upload your ID information. After upgrading to a professional account, you can proceed to open your store. This method is more comprehensive and reduces the risk of violating community guidelines. When choosing the type of store, select 'Ordinary Goods' and upload the corresponding ID information. Personal stores can be opened instantly, while individual businesses may take up to three working days.

Title: Upgrading to a Professional Account
Content: Upgrading to a professional account on Xiaohongshu is an essential step for opening a store. This process involves verifying your identity and providing additional information to ensure compliance with platform regulations. To upgrade, go to 'Account and Security,' scroll down to 'Upgrade to Professional Account,' and click on it. You will need to upload your ID information and complete the application process. Once approved, you can proceed to open your store. This method is recommended because it provides a more secure and compliant way to set up your store, reducing the risk of encountering issues related to community guidelines. The professional account upgrade ensures that your store is fully verified and ready for business.

Title: Choosing the Right Store Type
Content: When opening a store on Xiaohongshu, it is crucial to choose the correct store type to avoid complications. The recommended option is 'Ordinary Goods,' which is suitable for most sellers. To select this option, follow the registration process and ensure that you upload the corresponding ID information. Personal stores can be opened instantly, while individual businesses may require up to three working days for approval. Choosing the right store type ensures that your store meets the platform's requirements and operates smoothly. It also helps in avoiding potential issues related to incorrect store categorization, which can lead to delays or violations of community guidelines.
